definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The government will phase out an advertising campaign.
sentences.chinese: 政府将分阶段开展广告宣传。

sentences.english: They built up the product by advertising.
This post showcases the most unusual and creative advertising campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 这篇帖子陈列了最与众不同和有创意的广告宣传。

sentences.english: Commercial activities or advisement circulations without prior approval are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止事先未经批准的商业活动或广告宣传。

sentences.english: Full-pae newspaper ads hawk the fast-selling J3 hatchback.
sentences.chinese: 报纸的整版广告宣传着这种畅销的J3斜背式小客车。
共同广告宣传推广服务。

sentences.english: Extensive advertising can cause a factitious demand for an article.
sentences.chinese: 大规模的广告宣传能引起对某一商品的反常需求。

sentences.english: His allies are outspending his opponents in advertising by a ratio of 2-to-1.
sentences.chinese: 他的同盟在广告宣传上的花费是他的对手的两倍。

sentences.english: As an Internet marketer , it is vitally important to know how well your advertising campaigns are doing.
sentences.chinese: 作为互联网有一手，是十分重要知道你做广告宣传。

sentences.english: Of course advertising alone can't repair a company's reputation, says Leslie Gaines-Ross, chief reputation strategist at public relations firm Weber Shandwick.
sentences.chinese: 当然，单凭广告宣传还不能修复企业破损的声誉。

sentences.english: The campaign is to encourage women that you can make it if you want it.
sentences.chinese: 这个广告宣传时鼓励女性，只要你想做到，就能做到。

sentences.english: The ad campaign was false, but it was working.
sentences.chinese: 广告宣传活动是虚假的，但它起到了作用。

sentences.english: Taking that money and spending it on advertisements and small-dollar fundraising solicitations.
sentences.chinese: 把钱花到了广告宣传和小额筹款上。

sentences.english: The business model for microblog advertising is simple.
sentences.chinese: 微博广告宣传的商业模式很简单。

sentences.english: Four, white wine, liquor advertisements identical outer packing showiness.
sentences.chinese: 白酒外包装雷同，白酒广告宣传浮夸。

sentences.english: Several steps are required to develop an advertising campaign.
sentences.chinese: 在展开一场广告宣传浩动时需要几个步骤。

definition: to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
amusing speech or act/jokes/antics/funny/amusing/Taiwan pr. [xue1 tou2]
viral marketing/see also 病毒營銷|病毒营销[bing4 du2 ying2 xiao1]
to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to bend the rules/to skirt around the issue
